<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disciple of Shade](/Feats.aspx?ID=3011) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 226 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101)

**Prerequisites**
[Shadowcaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3009)

</column>

---

You've delved deeper into the mysteries of shadow and become blessed with magical power that increases your skills in the arts of deception and persuasion. You gain the [_inscrutable mask_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1061) domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
